ygData.subject: Re: Eclipse and Wolveritron

Eclipse, he's a werewolf, hence wolf creature. I would have said wolf if it=
 had been a wolf, and would have found out the name, sorry for any inconven=
iances.
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: CYBERWOLF4 
  To: nbwrpg@eg=
roups.com 
  Sent: Sunday, October 01, 2000 6:01 PM
  Subject: Re: Eclipse =
and Wolveritron


  Which Wolf creature? theres at least 4 in this game?
  =
  ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: David Torrey 
    To: nbwrpg@egro=
ups.com 
    Sent: Sunday, October 01, 2000 12:17 PM
    Subject: Eclipse a=
nd Wolveritron


    ::Eclipse::

        He had been walking around the CF=
 for quite some time, but finally he knew where he was going. He decided to=
 try an visit the bridge.
        On his way he ran into Valtron. "Are you =
new here?"

    ::Wolveritron::

        He had been wandering the woods in=
 Beast Mode for some time and had yet to find Dark Prime. The Wolf creature=
 had run past him, but he had decided not to follow. He was still trying to=
 refind the sent of Dark Prime, but couldn't.
